Articles of visitation and enquiry concerning matters ecclesiastical exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens, and side-men of every parish within the diocess of Sarum. In the primary episcopal visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God Gilbert by divine permission, Lord Bishop of Sarum. Church of England. Diocese of Salisbury. Bishop (1689-1715 : Burnet) Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
[4], 12 p.
Printed for Ric. Chiswell, at the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-Yard, London : MDCLXXXIX [1689]
Imperfect: cropped, stained with slight loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
